44.eng-name: The Book of the Merits of the Companions
44.ara-name: كتاب فضائل الصحابة رضى الله تعالى عنهم

hadiths.text: This tradition has been transmitted on the authority of Shu'ba through A'mash, but there is a difference of order of the four

chapter.ara-name: باب مِنْ فَضَائِلِ عَبْدِ اللَّهِ بْنِ مَسْعُودٍ وَأُمِّهِ رَضِيَ اللَّهُ تَعَالَى عَنْهُمَا
chapter.eng-name: The Virtues Of 'Abdullah Bin Mas'ud And His Mother (RA)
